resources.string: Every year there is tons of traffic at Sac State. The goal of this app is to reduce traffic and show you alternative modes of transportation. This can help reduce traffic, carbon emissions, and travel costs. Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… Etc… End of text
This activity will display the data for the mode of transportation that the user selects
This Activity is where you can create a travel plan
This activity will allow the user to compare the different modes of transportation

Enter in your home address below, we won\'t share that info with anyone. You may put a general location if you don\'t want to put your actual address but that will reduce the accuracy of our recommendations for you
image of whichever type this button will send user to
